, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0935\u093e\u0915\u094d\u092f\u0915\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0948\u0936\u093e\u0930\u0926\u094d\u092f\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0930\u094b\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0965</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sAmkhya, yOga, lOkAyata\ntogether are anvIkShikI. dharma and adharma will be known through trayi. artha\nand anartha are discussed in vArta. naya i.e., governance and apanaya i.e.,\nmis-governance are understood by daNDanIti.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By means of evaluating the pro and\ncons and by testing through the reasoning philosophy helps the worldly\ntransactions. &nbsp; &nbsp;Also, philosophy establishes a equanimity towards the situations\nof bad (vyasana) and good (abhyudaya) times. &nbsp; It also improves the ability to\nperform duties properly, makes one to express better and improves the\nconcentration of mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nListen to Chanakya-<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">dharmaadharmau trayAm\narthaanarthau vArtAyAM nayaanayau daNDa-nItyAM balaabale cha etAsAM hetubhir\nanvIkShamANA lokasya upakaroti vyasane .abhyudaye cha buddhim avasthApayati\npraj~nA-vAkya-kriyA-vaishAradyaM cha karoti ||</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Logical analysis by\nmeans of proper arguments of dharma and adharma, which belong to the realm of\nthe veda, profit and loss which belong to the realm of business, good and bad\npolicies which belong to the realm of political science, [as also] the\nstrengths and weaknesses of each branch of knowledge, benefits the people,\nkeeps the intellect steady both in dire situations and good times, and\ngenerates expertise in the spheres of mental, verbal and physical activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">shushrUShA shravaNa\ngrahaNa dhAraNa vij~nAna^Uhaapoha tattvaabhiniviShTa buddhiM vidyA vinayati\nna^itaram || 1.5.05</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The acquisition of\nknowledge can only culture those whose intellect is endowed with the abilities\nof discipline, learning from verbal instruction, grasping concepts, memory,\ndiscrimination, inference and applying falsification, but not others [those who\nlack these].<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-urrNIBWNcag/V3enDJ3iX9I/AAAAAAABKtY/eaMmLHObaeU2-O_jsk5PpI2lzHaAqFfuQCLcB/s1600/aiterezya.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"284\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-urrNIBWNcag/V3enDJ3iX9I/AAAAAAABKtY/eaMmLHObaeU2-O_jsk5PpI2lzHaAqFfuQCLcB/s640/aiterezya.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Maharishi\nwas the ULTIMATE metaphysician\u2014who clarified fundamental notions by which\npeople understand the world, e.g., existence, objects and their properties,\nspace and time, cause and effect, and possibility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He explored the nature\nof being, becoming, existence or reality as well as the basic categories of\nbeing and their relations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A guru in an shram\nwould first to state the views of his opponent among his own students before he\nformulated his own theory. This statement of the opponent's case came to be\nknown as the prior view (purvapaksa). &nbsp;&nbsp;Then\nfollowed the refutation (khandana) of this view. &nbsp;&nbsp;Last of all came the statement and proof of\nthe philosopher's own position, which, therefore, was known as the subsequent\nview (uttarapaksa) or the conclusion (siddh\u00e4nta). &nbsp;All this was WIN-WIN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the openness of\nmind-the willingness to listen to what others have to say has been one of the\nchief causes of the wealth and greatness of Indian philosophy in thepast, it\nhas a definite moral for the future.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sankhya tradition's realism reduces\nthe world to an evolution from two fundamental entities, spirit and matter (\npurusha /prakriti )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y0A1JtzUVG0/V3fmh2XvjmI/AAAAAAABKuE/kko_9VERr-cf4XhH94Kun0bAuApNmfb3gCLcB/s1600/imahges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Y0A1JtzUVG0/V3fmh2XvjmI/AAAAAAABKuE/kko_9VERr-cf4XhH94Kun0bAuApNmfb3gCLcB/s400/imahges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8i0IJvHKwH8/V3fm4QRuRiI/AAAAAAABKuI/0Z25elu-yAwu4n6I1kLUgfO3jP4BGp-ZACLcB/s1600/shiva-shn%2Bnakti.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8i0IJvHKwH8/V3fm4QRuRiI/AAAAAAABKuI/0Z25elu-yAwu4n6I1kLUgfO3jP4BGp-ZACLcB/s640/shiva-shn%2Bnakti.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spiritual is all about SPIRAL\nmotion. Math is a model to describe motion.&nbsp;\nSpiritual math is all about creating models to show us spiritual motion.\nMany math concepts surprisingly can map to spiritual concepts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9cwhrSCrHxI/V3fqooCvdrI/AAAAAAABKuo/jWCicOMkZ9goGysJfZkOiiPJbvh4fHZ4ACLcB/s1600/Sacred%2BSpviral.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9cwhrSCrHxI/V3fqooCvdrI/AAAAAAABKuo/jWCicOMkZ9goGysJfZkOiiPJbvh4fHZ4ACLcB/s640/Sacred%2BSpviral.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mathematics, as used in\nmodern science, has proven to be an extremely powerful language. In physics, it\nhas reached the point where scientists do not believe a particular theory has\nany value unless it can be captured in an equation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FO_YY5K2ZUk/V3fsUnA64nI/AAAAAAABKu8/XWkqZITVhicWg66YI_FHOCJWQax1KsaDACLcB/s1600/Nautijjlus_flickr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Often, a theory evolves\nsimply because the mathematics of it is \"elegant\", and then later,\nexperiments discover that the equations were right<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-nozCQqKf-aw/V3fsFCC-bwI/AAAAAAABKu4/LkQfX4-0AWg7OD-_S-8qIvkZGPzVVE8PwCLcB/s1600/Fibonacci-Sequxence.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means the math\ncomes first, and the verification, in actual experimental reality, follows.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Einstein was so poor in Math that the only\nway he could do something was to lift from Vedanta. The selfish and immoral\nGerman JEW Albert Einstein &nbsp;married his\nfirst wife ( a mathematician ) so that she can do his math..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calculus is rooted in\nspirituality\u2014and there is NO way Isaac Newton could have invented it..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
