, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishis EXPERIENCED\nunlike modern scientists who just explained.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The truth within Sanatana\nDharma is like an underground river. The essence of that common truth can be\nsummarized in the Hindu expression tat tvam asi, \"Thou art that.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mystics perceived God,\nor Brahman, as an underlying Ground of Being out of which springs the reality\nwe perceive. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within each of us lies\na spark of that divinity-- the \"Atman\" of Hinduism. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ultimately, upon\nachieving enlightenment, the mystic realizes that her inner self, her Atman, is\nexactly the same as the outer Ground, or Brahman. Atman and Brahman are one --\n\"thou art that.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TAT- TWAM ASI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jivan Mukts has\nliberated themselves.&nbsp; They have burnt\ntheir EGO , and desires , of thought, of all sense of an individual self. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you can do this --\nif you can truly become nothing -- then an amazing thing happens.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WHAAAAM --&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oG0xxKuz3lk/V3fl0XdAnRI/AAAAAAABKt8/OIa3NyN4OKE8o9nD7wfrZo1EPgH8t0irwCLcB/s1600/imag77ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"425\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oG0xxKuz3lk/V3fl0XdAnRI/AAAAAAABKt8/OIa3NyN4OKE8o9nD7wfrZo1EPgH8t0irwCLcB/s640/imag77ges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Suddenly,\nin that moment of enlightenment, you realize that you are everything! </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N88qwQVqV2k/V3flXRmrWbI/AAAAAAABKtw/XvEs2ZHjyBIHBtrh812Eqtgm-AyDDOtpgCLcB/s1600/imaddges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N88qwQVqV2k/V3flXRmrWbI/AAAAAAABKtw/XvEs2ZHjyBIHBtrh812Eqtgm-AyDDOtpgCLcB/s400/imaddges.jpg\" width=\"268\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This experience is\nproven time and again in the writings of the great mystics, who talk of their\nunion with all of life, of becoming one with the entire universe.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM A PARADOX LOVER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Check this out\u2014it is a\nback swing !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aI0vrwrNySg/V3flqR-95LI/AAAAAAABKt4/yn_vcnHbeGkLnROXzgPSKD2wKbvsEFBXACLcB/s1600/imcages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aI0vrwrNySg/V3flqR-95LI/AAAAAAABKt4/yn_vcnHbeGkLnROXzgPSKD2wKbvsEFBXACLcB/s1600/imcages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mystic formula--\nbecome nothing and you will become everything<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we put this formula\ninto an equation, it looks ludicrous. The mystics seem to be saying that if you\ncan become nothing, or zero, you will also realize that you are everything, or\ninfinity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, the equation would\nread:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GJC5x3aR7qA/V3fkiUams3I/AAAAAAABKts/0k_VPHYO-4UYAi1ByUzE0hTZb5o-h0GgwCLcB/s1600/icnfinity.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"146\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GJC5x3aR7qA/V3fkiUams3I/AAAAAAABKts/0k_VPHYO-4UYAi1ByUzE0hTZb5o-h0GgwCLcB/s320/icnfinity.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calculus is one of the\ngreatest achievements of the human intellect.&nbsp;\nSometimes called the \" mathematics of changes\", it is the\nbranch of mathematics that deals with the precise way in which changes in one\nvariable relate to changes in another.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">n our daily activities we encounter two types of variables:&nbsp; those that we can control directly and those\nthat we cannot.&nbsp; Fortunately, those\nvariables that we cannot control directly often respond in some way to those we\ncan. .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By understanding quantitatively\nhow the variables, which we cannot control directly, respond to those that we\ncan, we can hope to make predictions about the behavior of our environment and\ngain some mastery over it.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calculus is one\nof the fundamental mathematical tools used for this purpose. Calculus was\ninvented to answer questions that could not be solved by using algebra or\ngeometry.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Any credence given to the\nstudy of mathematics must recognize that God is the original\nmathematician.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-naTFG8-oC_Y/V3frtYnJeHI/AAAAAAABKu0/Nva5LwT388MbcYNn-Wg_inp92VhkouBLwCLcB/s1600/79a3708aaf793e3f7fx8f0eb9775c70a8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"626\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-naTFG8-oC_Y/V3frtYnJeHI/AAAAAAABKu0/Nva5LwT388MbcYNn-Wg_inp92VhkouBLwCLcB/s640/79a3708aaf793e3f7fx8f0eb9775c70a8.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And though, through the\nages, humankind has experimented to be able to draw conclusion in the areas of\nmathematics,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-F3YCny9X0V0/V3fsxOJ8-6I/AAAAAAABKvA/P3lJOkShevMm9bfxg5vWMvZRfXLqQ2ayQCLcB/s1600/Golden-Rzatio-Math.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-F3YCny9X0V0/V3fsxOJ8-6I/AAAAAAABKvA/P3lJOkShevMm9bfxg5vWMvZRfXLqQ2ayQCLcB/s1600/Golden-Rzatio-Math.gif\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God's laws are error-free and constant.&nbsp; His everlasting watch-care in the 'natural'\ncyclic phenomena of this earth daily proves His mathematical supremacy.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WwwFDdfYYYk/V3fqBJszbII/AAAAAAABKuc/kEV-icHtQRwZyG_XSHkgarQjI3kflwCJgCLcB/s1600/c4869b5100324d9d502a3d%2B%2Bd741914d47.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WwwFDdfYYYk/V3fqBJszbII/AAAAAAABKuc/kEV-icHtQRwZyG_XSHkgarQjI3kflwCJgCLcB/s400/c4869b5100324d9d502a3d%2B%2Bd741914d47.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are\nthe variables and God is the constant.&nbsp;\nGod doesn't change; He is the same God from the beginning. God's laws,\nboth the moral law and the laws of nature, are as constant as He is.&nbsp; So we can expect that tomorrow the sun will\nrise in the east, as it has done every day in the past.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without God in one's\nlife, we will never find satisfactory solutions to problems. In calculus, if we\nviolate the laws we will never find the right solution to the given problem or\nfunction.&nbsp; When we violate the laws of\nGod our life become chaotic and we will never find peace or the right solutions\nto our problems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of limits is very important in calculus.&nbsp; Without limits calculus simply does not\nexist.&nbsp; Every single notion of calculus\nis a limit in one sense or another.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On\nthe contrary brahmAn has no limit.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oKp68YWQndE/V3fqYcbC-1I/AAAAAAABKuk/BZyUBpF2Q4IFHlsXrvlYZ5gZT-J56G1ZACLcB/s1600/imavges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oKp68YWQndE/V3fqYcbC-1I/AAAAAAABKuk/BZyUBpF2Q4IFHlsXrvlYZ5gZT-J56G1ZACLcB/s400/imavges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calculus,\nmust NOT be taught in isolation but should be related to life and faith. Mathematics\nis a revelation of the thought life of God.&nbsp;\nIt shows Him to be a God of system, order, and accuracy.&nbsp; He can be depended upon.&nbsp; His logic is certain.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By thinking in mathematical terms, therefore,\nwe are actually thinking God's thoughts after Him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OFEo9bCiYE4/V3fpjJpYJ-I/AAAAAAABKuY/e-na3MNicQ4C6-Ro-0gZk5r6IGnWUZG1QCLcB/s1600/ivmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OFEo9bCiYE4/V3fpjJpYJ-I/AAAAAAABKuY/e-na3MNicQ4C6-Ro-0gZk5r6IGnWUZG1QCLcB/s400/ivmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \"empty\"\nvacuum of space is full, in terms of energy. If you add together all the\nwavelengths of energy available in any point of space, the result turns out to\nbe nearly infinite.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means, in any given cubic-centimeter of\n\"empty\" space, you can find an almost limitless amount of energy in\nthe form of waves. &nbsp;&nbsp;The amount of energy\nin the vacuum of space is equal to 1094g/cm3 .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a one followed by 94\nzeros. By comparison, the amount of energy available in solid matter (based on\nEinstein's famous E=MC2) is only 1014g/cm3 , a difference of 80 zeros!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, in fact, the\nnothingness of empty space is far more full than the somethingness of matter --\nby a long shot! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BY ENERGY FROM NUCLEUS\nOF ATOM , WE GOT HIROSHIMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BY EMPTY SPACE WITHIN\nATOM YOU CAN BOIL OF OCEANS IN SECONDS<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet, somehow, these\nwaves cancel themselves out (via the crest/trough mathematics described above)\nand the result, in terms of measurement, is zero. So, once again, we have a\nscientific verification of the fact that nothing does equal everything, that\nzero can be the sum total of infinity.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Vedanta our\nuniverse is just one of an infinite number of universes which bubble forth from\nan endless, eternal ocean of nothingness.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X8Yu87WOZTM/V3igPKQJieI/AAAAAAABKvo/Rh1OhE98yL8LQcA2vmauPoNfytuR9Y2PACLcB/s1600/imagddes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-X8Yu87WOZTM/V3igPKQJieI/AAAAAAABKvo/Rh1OhE98yL8LQcA2vmauPoNfytuR9Y2PACLcB/s400/imagddes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creating universes out\nof nothing may seen to violate cherished conservation principles, until we\nrealize that it takes no energy to create a universe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma breathes in and\nall vibrations stop\u2014matter disappears. Brahma breates out , vibration starts , &nbsp;energy becomes matter again\u2014 and LO-- a new cosmos has\nmanifested.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the universe is\nclosed like a bubble, then the energy content of its matter is positive, while\nthe energy of its gravity is negative. The sum is exactly zero...Thus it takes\nno net energy to create new bubbles, which are constantly being created in the\nsea of nothing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Space has an energy\ndensity of 1094 grams per cubic centimeter. To call space a \u201cvacuum\u201d or the\n\u201cquantum vacuum\u201d is a misnomer because everything that we know about space\nindicates that it is not empty. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not a vacuum but\nrather a plenum\u2014an absolute fullness, characterized by nearly infinite energy\ndensity and boundless luminosity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Space is literally\nefflorescing with virtual photons and electron-positron pair production. It is\nnot dead, empty or inert but radiant and shimmering with energetic potential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This all-pervading\ncontinuum or unified field has the features and qualities of what indigenous\npeople called the Great Spirit.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The infinite potential of the plenum is our\npotential.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0Pn5oo24THM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0Pn5oo24THM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Om Purnamadah\nPurnamidam Purnat Purnamudachyate<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Purnasya Purnamadaya\nPurnamevavashisyate<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 20px;\">From infinity is born infinity.</span><br style=\"background-color: white; box-sizing: border-box; color: #333333; line-height: 20px;\" /><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 20px;\">When infinity is taken out of infinity,</span><br style=\"background-color: white; box-sizing: border-box; color: #333333; line-height: 20px;\" /><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 20px;\">only infinity is left over.</span></i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><i>Om, the BrahmAn is infinite, whole and\ncomplete,</i></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In \"Brhadaranyaka\nUpanishad 5.1\" of the Shukla Yajur Veda 1.4.10 quotes \"Kham\nBrahmn\" based on \"adhibhoudika\" meaning of this passage\n\"Zero is Brahman\" (complete, infinite, etc...)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Geometry is used\nthroughout the Rig Veda. However, unlike modern geometry, the emphasis was not\non proofs but on usage. &nbsp;The maharishis had knowledge of the concept of\nprecision, and this is evident from various descriptions of applications and\nuse of geometry.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Further, the depth of precision was based on the requirements of\nthe task or study being described. For example, descriptions of constructions\nwere limited in precision whereas descriptions of astronomical phenomena were\ndescribed in greater precision<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The following verse in\nthe Rig Veda deals with the formation of the universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Who was the measurer\nprama? What was the model pratim\u00e2? What were the building materials for things\noffered nid\u00e2nam \u00e3jyam? What is the circumference (of this universe) paridhih?\nWhat are the meters or harmonies behind the Universe chandah? What is the\ntriangle (yoke) praugam [which connects this universe to the source of driving\nforce, the engine?</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of Shunya,\nor zero void, was originally conceived as the symbol of Brahman, expressing the\nsum of all distinct forms. The symbol of zero and the decimal system of\nnotation is described in the Atharvaveda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of shunya\nwas not just mathematical or scientific, but is deeply rooted in all branches\nof thought - especially metaphysics and cosmology. Shunya is the transition\npoint between oposites, it symbolises the real balance between divergent\ntendencies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most ancient mathematicians defined zero as the sum of two equal\nand opposite quantities. Zero produces all figures, but is itself not limited\nto a certain value. Zero is the primary or final reservoir of all single\nnumbers. The symbol of zero and the decimal system of notation is described in\nthe Atharvaveda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of \u2018Zero\u2019\nor Shunya is derived from the concept of a void. The concept of void existed in\nHindu Philosophy hence the derivation of a symbol for it.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iwsK7UmPYys/V3lKpdTh4SI/AAAAAAABKyc/bTgglgK_YlEpfSlmODPRoMMVzq9DybNZgCLcB/s1600/vedic-mathematics-detaiCCls-6-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iwsK7UmPYys/V3lKpdTh4SI/AAAAAAABKyc/bTgglgK_YlEpfSlmODPRoMMVzq9DybNZgCLcB/s640/vedic-mathematics-detaiCCls-6-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 7000 year old\nYajurveda , Maharishis mentioned such large numbers such as ayuta (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u092f\u0941\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)\nfor \u2018ten thousand\u2019, niyuta (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u093f\u092f\u0941\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">) for \u2018hundred\nthousand\u2019, prayuta (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092f\u0941\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">) for \u2018million\u2019, arbuda\n(</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0930\u094d\u092c\u0941\u0926</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">)\nfor \u2018ten million\u2019, nyarbuda for \u2018hundred million\u2019 etc. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pingala Chandas\nshastram - in Sutra 8.29 \"rupe shunyam\" and Sutra 8.30 \"dvihi\nshunye\" - both these sutras use connect the 'valueless' usage of\n\"0\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aryabhata used the word\n\"Kha\" widely to denote emptiness (\"Kham\"). Sri.Suryadeva\ncommenting on Aryabhata\u2019s \"Kha\", says that , \u201ckhani sunya upa\nlakshitani\u201d&nbsp; In Brahmagupta\u2019s work, the\nword \"Kha\" gets prominence. \"Kha\" and Shunya (void) is used\nsynonymously.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Lilavati, when one come across the chapter on description of Shunya\n(zero), it\u2019s a veritable carnival of kha. The verse reads as follows: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Yoge kham\nkshepsamam, vargado kham, khabhajito rashi Khahara syat, khaguna kham, khaguna\nnishchantayashcha sheshavidhau!!\" - verse 46, Lilavati<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From the above it is\nevident that \"0\" as a place value system was there and also\n\"0\" as a number was also there since the Vedic times&nbsp; - in other words means \"anaadi\" -\nbeginingless or time immemorial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanskrit we have many\nwords for \"0\" depending on its value. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are below:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0942\u091c\u094d\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n/</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u0924\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(poojya /sat) = Holy (complete) - from the word Wholly<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u0942\u0928\u094d\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0930\u093f\u0915\u094d\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0930\u0928\u094d\u0926\u094d\u0930</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(shunya, rikta, randra) = Valueless<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0906\u092d\u0941</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0935\u094d\u092f\u0915\u094d\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(Aabhu, avyakta) = Inexpressible (value can't be determined)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0923</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0928\u0928\u094d\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(purna, ananta) = Complete, full, endless (infinite value)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u093f\u092c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u094d\u092f\u094b\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n(kha /kham, diba, vyoma) = Infinity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0941</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(bindu) = Point /Dot (used in fractions)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u0935\u094d\u092f\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n(avyaya) = NaN / Indeclinable<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u093e\u0919\u094d\u0916\u0947\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u094d\u0930\u092c\u093f\u0923\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(saankheya, drabinam) = Ordinal (while counting \"0\" as a number)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GDu1C5_uB0k/V3lKQp9zP4I/AAAAAAABKyY/43c99_fa9JsVSpGm8Bx9MkiucnQn2Tb7QCLcB/s1600/vedic-mathe%2Bmatics-sutras-tricks.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"332\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GDu1C5_uB0k/V3lKQp9zP4I/AAAAAAABKyY/43c99_fa9JsVSpGm8Bx9MkiucnQn2Tb7QCLcB/s640/vedic-mathe%2Bmatics-sutras-tricks.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the ancient times\nthe Ganita shaastra (mathematics) has its branches as -&nbsp; Geometry (Gyamiti) is the study of shapes and\ntheir applications; Algebra (Bija Ganita) is the study of operations and their\napplications; Trigonometry (Trikonamiti) is study of Triangles and the\nrelationships between their sides and the angles and Calculus (Chalana-kalana\nGanita) the study of change.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Cihl3_PCCU8/V3lEJXhwaWI/AAAAAAABKyI/Q5Jrf_TY6Oor-DvZ_t3qINJBQukTnWTJgCLcB/s1600/vedic-mathematics-for-Ncorporate-11-728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Cihl3_PCCU8/V3lEJXhwaWI/AAAAAAABKyI/Q5Jrf_TY6Oor-DvZ_t3qINJBQukTnWTJgCLcB/s640/vedic-mathematics-for-Ncorporate-11-728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/49_TJymgXgM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/49_TJymgXgM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8aieH96_6Dk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/8aieH96_6Dk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/gIo88Rt1JtI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/gIo88Rt1JtI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 7000 year old\nRig Veda we can trace the origin of the use of \"kha\" for space in the\ncontext of the \u201chole in the nave of a wheel through which the axle runs\u201d. &nbsp;\u201c Sunya\" (void) as well as\n\"purna\" (full) have a common reference in the Vedas.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Mg_7Af0lpkE/V3ig3tjv6MI/AAAAAAABKvw/nHsO2RSbCHY3kJ5WlbV4rjdEc_8V-0p-wCLcB/s1600/1239800_53134917cc0283217_693717052_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Mg_7Af0lpkE/V3ig3tjv6MI/AAAAAAABKvw/nHsO2RSbCHY3kJ5WlbV4rjdEc_8V-0p-wCLcB/s640/1239800_53134917cc0283217_693717052_n.jpg\" width=\"588\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The &nbsp;wheel (chakra - cycle), the names of various\nparts of wheel were&nbsp; used to explain\nmetaphysical concepts. Now, \"kha\" is the \"Naabhi\" of the\nwheel, the space within the hub. \"Naabhi\" is also the navel, navel of\nbeings and things.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3YcjzwDRQ7k/V3i9CrNCkLI/AAAAAAABKwE/5cVNRqXT06MuFKIduzXSZwIo3tqZmM0XwCLcB/s1600/ML_Pentagnnram.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"296\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3YcjzwDRQ7k/V3i9CrNCkLI/AAAAAAABKwE/5cVNRqXT06MuFKIduzXSZwIo3tqZmM0XwCLcB/s640/ML_Pentagnnram.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus, \"kha\" is the central space of things and\nbeings. In the Rigveda, \"kha\" or \"Naabhi\" of the world\nwheel is regarded as the receptacle and&nbsp;\nfountain&nbsp; of all order, formative\nideas and goods.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ZERO was invented by\nAryabhatta in 2700 BC.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iSgT2YMeyCQ/V3id5TApOSI/AAAAAAABKvQ/fkZ0X72kd-sVRP_UDdMvGDeZ1n3-CqRkwCLcB/s1600/89233d1b4743bc1cee7124zza6ac45dbbef.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iSgT2YMeyCQ/V3id5TApOSI/AAAAAAABKvQ/fkZ0X72kd-sVRP_UDdMvGDeZ1n3-CqRkwCLcB/s400/89233d1b4743bc1cee7124zza6ac45dbbef.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today BrahmAn ( aakasha\n/ ether ) is called ZERO POINT FIELD by modern science<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In quantum field\ntheory, the vacuum state is the quantum state with the lowest possible energy is\ncalled Zero Point Field ; it contains no physical particles, and is the energy\nof the ground state.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0TZ2_qHui4Q/V3if1D_tCnI/AAAAAAABKvg/WaekDDX_tb4K5h8xCnDV4mKRiP3BxrrwQCLcB/s1600/ZU%2BCHART%2B-vv%2BZero%2BPoint%2B.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0TZ2_qHui4Q/V3if1D_tCnI/AAAAAAABKvg/WaekDDX_tb4K5h8xCnDV4mKRiP3BxrrwQCLcB/s1600/ZU%2BCHART%2B-vv%2BZero%2BPoint%2B.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is also called the zero point energy; the energy of a\nsystem at a temperature of zero.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Yet the empty space within a tiny atom has\nenough power to boil off entire oceans.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FAvWG1ya62A/V3igi4H5LZI/AAAAAAABKvs/BAJE4ssK_fgU-0dlXwx0QR2q0Cu6FA_VwCLcB/s1600/1wwb6cca7f6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FAvWG1ya62A/V3igi4H5LZI/AAAAAAABKvs/BAJE4ssK_fgU-0dlXwx0QR2q0Cu6FA_VwCLcB/s640/1wwb6cca7f6.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Science cannot progress\nbeyond a point unless it factors in consciousness--the field of brahmAn.. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7XUV8Yg4OoY/V3iffcgyjvI/AAAAAAABKvY/7zAS33eb8zcgJRJSoUooYNPE8ipmoZuPACLcB/s1600/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAS1xccAAAAJDZhNTFjZGIxLWZhZmQtNDgwZC1iOGUzLTYyM2VhZDg4OGQ1OA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7XUV8Yg4OoY/V3iffcgyjvI/AAAAAAABKvY/7zAS33eb8zcgJRJSoUooYNPE8ipmoZuPACLcB/s640/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAS1xccAAAAJDZhNTFjZGIxLWZhZmQtNDgwZC1iOGUzLTYyM2VhZDg4OGQ1OA.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You may NOT believe this\n, but I understood consciousness at the age of 5.&nbsp; I had a Tamilian Brahmin Iyer neighbor, (\nchildless ) who named me AJIT &nbsp;and my two\nelder sister\u2014who has a huge library at home on Vedanta. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had a Ford car and\nhe used to feed me rosgollas. &nbsp;&nbsp;I uses to\nsuck out the juice and spit out the white matter.&nbsp; Only later I came to know that it was to be\ndone the opposite way.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e86_60Wy0Co/V3ifF_S2MjI/AAAAAAABKvU/G_MfrTsOYYksK5v_YuGN09ZOhxDYaeL7ACLcB/s1600/im%2Bages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e86_60Wy0Co/V3ifF_S2MjI/AAAAAAABKvU/G_MfrTsOYYksK5v_YuGN09ZOhxDYaeL7ACLcB/s400/im%2Bages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: This is a VEDIC VIMANA concept-- &nbsp; gyroscopic mercury, &nbsp;imploding / expanding vortices.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4zPOxm6r__A/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4zPOxm6r__A?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world over, intellectuals ( following single holy book religions ) &nbsp;have shed their idea of god with long hair, beard -the mythic figure, sitting\non his throne in heaven.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is now\nreplaced by a nebulous, amorphous field of divinity, the Ground of Being- the\nbrahmAn, the morphogenetic FIELD of consciousness .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This FIELD cannot be\ngrasped intellectually, but can only be hinted at, through concepts such as\n\"the void\" or \"emptiness.\" &nbsp;To the mystics, God is an eternal, infinite\nNothing, that at the same time is the source and foundation of Everything.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-geQxhSR2hxk/V3kDM7ZIpmI/AAAAAAABKws/yF_zvHt9cOM5XBqQCCSjyl71kkwp09NLwCLcB/s1600/consciousness-society-conference-prADesentation-nitric-oxide-spiking-and-consciousness-84-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-geQxhSR2hxk/V3kDM7ZIpmI/AAAAAAABKws/yF_zvHt9cOM5XBqQCCSjyl71kkwp09NLwCLcB/s640/consciousness-society-conference-prADesentation-nitric-oxide-spiking-and-consciousness-84-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA USED\nTHE TEMPLATE OF THE MORPHOGENETIC FIELD OF CONSCIOUSNESS AS THE BASE ( ADVAITA\n)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON TOP OF THIS THEY\nIMPOSED THE SECOND TEMPLATE KNOWS AT DVAITA- THE DANCE BETWEEN OPPOSITE POLES (\nBRAHMA / SHIVA ) MEDIATED BY A PRESERVER FORCE ( VISHNU ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AND THEN FINALLY THE\nTHIRD TEMPLATE OF SAMKHYA, THE MERGING OF PURUSHA ( SHIVA- MALE ) AND PRAGATI (\nSHAKTI- FEMALE ) &nbsp;TO CREATE. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Shiva is the changeless static aspect of\nConsciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same\nConsciousness. When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient\nPurusha , the universe evolves.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Vedanta the Universe\nis holographic in nature .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike a conventional\nhologram, the Holographic Universe is multidimensional in nature. &nbsp;A hologram is &nbsp;is like a photograph that uses light to\nproject its image into a three dimensional object. In other words, it is a 3D\nprojection of light (energy).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qYRHOcEeIaA/V3kCOEfEZAI/AAAAAAABKwg/gkEfBeHKCosxPgTjuY59tVkpyRG36i6bQCLcB/s1600/e592e8f764ef860c99d5f62395df5cb63.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qYRHOcEeIaA/V3kCOEfEZAI/AAAAAAABKwg/gkEfBeHKCosxPgTjuY59tVkpyRG36i6bQCLcB/s400/e592e8f764ef860c99d5f62395df5cb63.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within any point in a holographic image, no\nmatter how small, all knowledge of the whole image is present. In other words,\nit has the potentiality of projecting the whole from which it emerged.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZSSU-u2llK0/V3j--H9rvYI/AAAAAAABKwU/41cbOLG2uBU1cK6cm6UmV7eJ84a576kQACLcB/s1600/d923992AA6ad454b109a067852b7c854e5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZSSU-u2llK0/V3j--H9rvYI/AAAAAAABKwU/41cbOLG2uBU1cK6cm6UmV7eJ84a576kQACLcB/s400/d923992AA6ad454b109a067852b7c854e5.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphogenetic fields,\nthey are invisible fields that shape and form every system in the Holographic\nUniverse, such as stars, planets, and the human body.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BxTEwgFt4GQ/V3kChXE7JAI/AAAAAAABKwk/Ypcv71JmcwoEa5ys0Zcfs-QoT5TwrzD3gCLcB/s1600/doSSwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BxTEwgFt4GQ/V3kChXE7JAI/AAAAAAABKwk/Ypcv71JmcwoEa5ys0Zcfs-QoT5TwrzD3gCLcB/s400/doSSwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be more specific,\nmorphogenetic fields are living thought form fields that act as templates upon\nwhich matter is manifested. They also allow consciousness to create structure\nso that it can experience itself.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/v0_xdWqAUlc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/v0_xdWqAUlc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><br /></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even after mapping out\n3.15 billion base pairs of DNA in the human genome project, we were no closer\nto figuring out how to heal aberrant DNA for one reason. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While many scientists were looking at the\nfour single letters in a protein recipe and how they carry out bodily\nfunctions, they forgot to make room for consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our DNA code is fixed\nfor life, but the epigenome is flexible.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Epigenomes react to signals from\nthe outside world, such as diet , stress and upbringing .&nbsp; &nbsp;Even\nin differentiated cells, signals fine-tune cell functions through changes in\ngene expression.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A flexible epigenome allows us to adjust to changes in the\nworld around us, and to learn from our experiences. This happens both\nsingularly and collectively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Epigenome signaling can\nhappen from inside a cell, from neighboring cells, or from the environment\nentirely outside the cell.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; And, the results of your experiment\ncan be verified, just like an experiment in quantum physics, by a group of\nexperts in the field. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of us, however, do\nnot have the opportunity or inclination to study with a guru. The whole cosmos is interconnected in this field and speed is NOT restricted to Einstein's SPEED OF LIGHT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Sri Yantra ( DIVINE GEOMETRY OF OM ) which follows the Fibonacci series and the Golden ratio ( lifted from 7000 year old Vedic Mathematics ) is the mystical 3D holographic construct of the Cosmos by 9 VIRTUAL SPIRALLING VORTEX CONES \u2014 4 pointing upwards and 5 pointing downwards, as a sort of ying-yang balance<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The master cellular control system of the human body is holographic. What we commonly refer to as \"The Cellular Memory\" is the collective energy field generated by these individual cell memories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Sanatana Dharma was the first to understand the holographic nature of the cosmos. Vaastu is the basis of Hindu architecture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">DNA can be influenced by acoustic, electromagnetic and SCALAR WAVES.
