, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU ARE NEVER A LOSER\nUNLESS YOU QUIT TRYING.! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CQzUohk-f9U/V2zWGHLGF9I/AAAAAAABKfc/e_6nctpeVC4M2hCaOeFx65YQcunejWEjQCLcB/s1600/15293424ddd63-FDR_quote.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The phrase \"losing\nmy religion\" is an yank expression for \"being at the end of one's\nrope.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white man is\nincreasing getting burnt out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stressed people can\nfeel better if they can get things under control.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Burn out means feeling\nempty , beyond hope and beyond caring- all dried up- problems seem\ninsurmountable. You just can't muster the energy to care. You are overwhelmed-\nyou don\u2019t want to even throw down your cap - you just sink to your knees. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emotions are blunted and you can see\nhelplessness. The damage due to stress is physical, the damage due to burn out\nis emotional- life just seems not worth living. &nbsp;Self injury or suicide can be one way out , if\nthe victim does not know how to handle it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stressed people can find it out for\nthemselves- burn out has to be detected by others- for the detachment is\ngradual, burn out does not happen overnight .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doing work seems to be against\nyour core values, you are trapped for mere economic reasons. Burnt out men must\ntake time off- take a complete break from work. Victims of burn out must NOT be\nkept isolated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They must be allowed to say NO and declare \u201cenough is enough!\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">COME TO INDIA, TRY\nSPIRITUALITY- &nbsp;IT IS BETTER THAN CHEMICALS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_22.html?showComment=1466770691762#c4764458191550494523\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 24, 2016 at 5:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi ns,<br />\n<br />\nIN BATTLE OF BADR ( 624 AD ) , MOHAMMAD USED WATER AT A WEAPON.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY FILLED UP ALL WATERHOLES WITH SAND -- AND THE THIRSTY CARAVAN OF UMAYYAD MECCANS HAD NO OPTION BUT TO DIVERT TO AN OASIS AT BADR ( NERA MEDINA ).<br />\n<br />\nRICH AND PROMINENT MECCANS AND THEIR CAMELS IN THE CARAVAN WERE TOO WEAK AND MOHAMMAD WITH A TINY FORCE WAS ABLE TO DEFEAT A FORCE4 TIME LARGER.<br />\n<br />\nThe success at Badr was recorded in the Qur\u02be\u0101n as a divine sanction of the new religion: \u201cIt was not you who slew them, it was God\u2026in order that He might test the Believers by a gracious trial from Himself\u201d (8:17).<br />\n<br />\nTHE FUCKIN' PAKISTANIS REFERRED TO THE BATTLE OF KARGIL AS ANOTHER BATTLE OF BADR.<br />\n<br />\nTHE INPENETRABLE BOLAN AND KYBER PASSES WERE COMPROMISED - AND A MUSLIM GOONDA NAMED GHORI WAS CALLED IN BY A FATHER WHO WAS AGNGRY WITH HIS DAUGHTER BY PAYING HIM SUPARI .<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THIS IS HOW WE INDIANS BECAME SLAVES FOR 800 YEARS &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\nA SUFI SAINT FOR WHOM MODI CHADDOED CHADDAR -- KWAKAH MOINUDDIN CHISTI OF AJMER DID WATER TERRORISM BY POISONING THE LAKES OF HORSES/ CAMELS THE DAY BEFORE BATTLE.<br />\n<br />\nPRITHVI RAJ CHAUHAN COULD NOT FIGHT BACK AGAINST INVADER MOHAMMAD GHORI.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WE MUST TEACH TRUE HISTORY IN NCERT BOOKS.</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/first-supari-and-turning-point-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\nthis blogsite had written to modi to bring back the remains of HERO prithvi raj chauhan.<br />\n<br />\nhe has NOT cared.<br />\n<br />\nCheck out the video of Ghori .<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejYhmBAlSmU .</span><br />\n<br />\nPrithviraj Chauhan's grave AS DOOR KEEPER OF BABAR is kicked by Muslims of Pakistan .<br />\n<br />\nA dedicated dirty old shoe is available for who ever wants to beat the grave with this shoe.<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://rajputanas.com/tag/prithviraj-chauhan-tomb/ .</span><br />\n<br />\nStupid Afghans still think that Ghori was killed by Chauhan\u2014and they spit on the grave.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\">http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prithviraj_Chauhan .</span><br />\n<br />\n. The book \u201cArms and Armour: Traditional Weapons of India\u201d by E Jaiwant Paul says on the outskirts of Ghazni are two domed tombs . The larger was of Ghori and few meters away was a second smaller tomb of Prithviraj Chauhan . \u201cIn the centre of the second tomb was a bare patch of earth where the actual grave should have been . Hanging over this spot from the top of the dome is a long, thick rope ending in a knot at shoulder height . Local visitors would grab hold of this knot in one hand and stamp vigorously and repeatedly with one foot on the bare patch in the centre of the tomb,\u201d says Paul, a weapons collector .<br />\n<br />\nPaul, who saw this on his visit to Afghanistan says on seeking an explanation, he found that the Afghans still stamped on his grave because Prithviraj killed Ghori, 900 years ago .<br />\n<br />\nIn 1206, Mohammed Ghori was killed by a Hindu priest, in revenge for destroying hundreds of temples.<br />\n<br />\nHis killer waited for him to finish his evening namaz at jhelum, and then challenged him to a knife fight, where he succumbed.<br />\n<br />\nAt the age of 56 his reflexes were too poor.<br />\n<br />\nHis mighty empire was divided between his favourite Turkish slaves.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS GRAVE OF INDIAN HERO KING CHAUHAN IS THE DOOR KEEPER OF THE DARGAH OF GHORI .</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedKI_MD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_85b+seedKI_MD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VzQvnvlexPM/V20yoNyj8PI/AAAAAAABKkY/WWimCEUqFC0w0JGhHta26uyGKcOvu28ugCLcB/s640/101220XXS11341.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hinduism there are\nNO rigid rules for any ritual.&nbsp; There can\nbe no penalties .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia\non Ramadan fasting :--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE \u201c&nbsp; In some Muslim countries, failing to fast or\nthe open flouting of such behavior during Ramadan is considered a crime and is\nprosecuted as such. For instance, in Algeria, in October 2008 the court of\nBiskra condemned six people to four years in prison and heavy fines.[49]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kuwait, according to\nlaw number 44 of 1968, the penalty is a fine of no more than 100 Kuwaiti\ndinars, or jail for no more than one month, or both penalties, for those seen\neating, drinking or smoking during Ramadan daytime.[50][51] In some places in the\nU.A.E., eating or drinking in public during the daytime of Ramadan is\nconsidered a minor offence and would be punished by up to 150 hours of\ncommunity service.[52] In neighbouring Saudi Arabia, described by The Economist\nas taking Ramadan \"more seriously than anywhere else\",[53] there are\nharsher punishments, whereas in Malaysia, there is no such punishments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2014 in Kermanshah,\nIran, a non-Muslim was sentenced to having his lips burnt with a cigarette and\nfive Muslims were publicly flogged with 70 stripes for eating during\nRamadan.[55] Despite these punishments, some observers claim relatively few\nIranians fast during Ramadan.[56] UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.inquisitr.com/3215840/isis-fighters-torture-crusify-civilians-for-breaking-ramdam-fast/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.inquisitr.com/3215840/isis-fighters-torture-crusify-civilians-for-breaking-ramdam-fast/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Below: Caught eating during Ramadan fast</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4AxUvAmyzE4/V22HN45MHRI/AAAAAAABKks/PdUtRtc9I4YO1JOPGtssfUqSiKiFK_kXQCLcB/s1600/14364563714ee686_700.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4AxUvAmyzE4/V22HN45MHRI/AAAAAAABKks/PdUtRtc9I4YO1JOPGtssfUqSiKiFK_kXQCLcB/s640/14364563714ee686_700.jpeg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;CAUGHT EATING DURING RAMADAN FAST</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; THEY WILL COME BACK ON EARTH .<br />\n<br />\nONCE A SOUL HAS ENTERED A HUMAN BODY IT CANNOT GO BACK AS ANIMAL.<br />\n<br />\nSOUL EVOLUTION IS DIFFERENT FROM MAN TO MONKEY STUFF OF MAD MAN CHARLES DARWIN.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY LIVING THING WHICH GROWS -- EVEN UNICELLED LANKTON ALGAE HAS SOUL WITHIN.<br />\n<br />\nCONSCIOUS MAMMALS ( INDIAN ELEPHANTS/ DOLPHINS/ BONOBOS ETC ) WHO PASS COLOUR TEST AND MIRROR TEST WILL BE HUMANS IN NEXT BIRTH.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY SOUL WAS BORN WITH THE STARS WHEN BRAHMA EXHALED --<br />\n<br />\nthis means YOU, your great grandfather and your unborn great grandson ill have same split second age.<br />\n<br />\nall souls are part of brahman . this is why in mahabharata before they fight to kill, they first do NAMASTE-- an acknowledgement of the DIVINE within the enemy.<br />\n<br />\nAS A HUMAN SOUL GETS PURIFIED AND EVOLVED , AND KARMIC BAGGAGE REDUCED , ITS FREQUENCY INCREASES.<br />\n<br />\nONLY CONSCIOUS \"HUMAN SOULS\" HAVE KARMA.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A LEELA OF ENERGY --<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A SOUL GETS MOKSHA IT MERGES WITH BRAHMAN. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">RAMA\nKILLED KING VALI FROM BEHIND\u2014FOR HIS IN HIS NEXT BIRTH AS KRISHNA THE SAME VALI\nIN A HUNTER RE-BIRTH WOULD KILL KRISHNA BY BLEEDING HIM UNDER THE FOOT WITH AN ARROW.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">KRISHNA\nIN ADDITION TO KILLING HIS BELOVED GATEKEEPERS JAYA AND VIJAYA &nbsp;HAD A HIDDEN TASK\u2014THAT ALL KILLING ALL 100\nTEST TUBE BABIES ( KAURAVAS ).&nbsp; HE DID IT\nAND GAVE MOKSHA TO ALL OF THEM.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/ethics-of-human-cloning-decided-6000.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/ethics-of-human-cloning-decided-6000.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>AFTER\nTHE MAHABHARATA WAR YUDDHISTRA ASCENDED THE ALLEGORICAL MOUNT MERU &nbsp;( FROM MOUNT\nKAILASH &nbsp;AREA) &nbsp;AND SAW HIS PANDAVA BROTHERS (\nSOULS ) &nbsp;IN THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER ALONG\nWITH THE CRIMINALS &nbsp;\u2013&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>HE GOT UPSET AND DEMANDED OF\nYAMA--THE GUARDIAN OF THE SOUTH ( FIRST LAYER) &nbsp;, WHY THIS IS SO-- WE ARE THE GOOD GUYS SUPPORTED BY KRISHNA &nbsp;. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHEN\nHE REACHED THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER HE WAS MOST SHOCKED TO SEE BITTER ENEMY AND\nBAD GUY DURYODHANA WITH ALL HIS KAURAVA BROTHERS HAD GOT MOKSHA BEFORE HIM. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>AFTER THIS ALL PANDAVAS AND DRAUPADI WERE AFFORDED MOKSHA -- MUCH LATER&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHAT IS THE LESSON ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: purple;\">SOME ON MAY CRY--WHY &nbsp;THE HELL DID YOU HAVE TO WAIT FOR 1011 POSTS AND 90974 COMMENTS TO TELL US THIS MOST CRUCIAL THING ? &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: purple;\">WELL-- &nbsp; YOU NEED TO KNOW THE PILLARS OF HINDUISM LIKE LEELA, &nbsp;MAYA, &nbsp;KARMA, DHARMA, &nbsp;SAMSARA AND MOKSHA TO EVEN GET A WHIFF OF THE GLORY OF HINDUISM.</b></span><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: purple;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS IS THE FIRST TIME , THE ABOVE IS BEING EXPLAINED --&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE GLORY OF SANATANA DHARMA HAS NOT BEEN UNDERSTOOD BY ANYBODY SINCE ADI SHANKARACHARYA 4000 YEARS AGO . .</b></span><br />\n<br />\nALL FAKE GURUS WILL NOW FALL OVER EACH OTHER IN THEIR HASTE TO CORRECT THE BULLSHIT THEY HAVE SAID AND WRITTEN. &nbsp; <br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/eyTT2UrTSCc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/eyTT2UrTSCc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\nFAKES CAN NEVER GET THE ESSENCE OR MORAL OF THE STORY -- &nbsp;WHY HAS NOBODY BEEN ABLE TO TELL THIS SINCE THE PAST 4000 YEARS ? WHAT ARE THEY WORTH ?<br />\n<br />\nALL OF THESE FAKE BASTARDS , WHOM THE WORLD ACCEPTS AS SPOKESMEN FOR HINDUISM AND ANCIENT INDIA , &nbsp;PEEK INTO MY POSTS DAILY . .<br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma has NIL\ndogma and is open to inquiry.&nbsp;&nbsp; It\nbelieves in a just world in which every soul is guided by karma to the ultimate\ngoal of Self Realization, leading to moksha, freedom from rebirth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It rests content in the\nknowledge of the divine origin of the soul, its passage through one life and\nanother until maturity ( soul evolution )&nbsp;\nhas been reached.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It offers guidance to\nall who take refuge in it, from the nonbeliever to the most evolved 12 strand\nDNA maharishi.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\ncherishes the largest storehouse of scripture and philosophy on the earth, and\nthe oldest. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is endowed with a\ntradition of saints and sages, of realized men and women, unrivaled on the\nearth.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The glory of Hinduism\nhas unfolded step by step in each of my 42 posts on Sanatana Dharma.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More lies ahead.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-a-6UE1s1uqI/V2plGGe6UaI/AAAAAAABKYM/57aqJz-tYqcF2cpBOmK3Q3cDavjVZ-7swCLcB/s1600/imadsseges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"283\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-a-6UE1s1uqI/V2plGGe6UaI/AAAAAAABKYM/57aqJz-tYqcF2cpBOmK3Q3cDavjVZ-7swCLcB/s400/imadsseges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu is NOT afraid\nof the HOUR OF JUDGEMENT after a single life on planet earth.&nbsp;&nbsp; His &nbsp;belief in reincarnation is so strong that it\ntotally eliminates the fear and dread of death.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Hindu fears death; nor does he\nlook forward to it. The word death in the vocabulary of the Hindu holds a\ndifferent meaning. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu knows he has\nmore chances to purify and evolve.&nbsp; He\nknows that while he lives on earth all were NOT placed by god at the same\nstarting block. Some were like Usain Bolt , some were lame. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lame ones do NOT ask for reservation . He\nknows in his next life , he will do well provided he reduces his karmic baggage\nin the present life on his own terms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He does not take death\nto be the end of existence; nor does he look upon life as a singular\nopportunity to be followed by eternal heavenly existence for those souls who do\nwell, and by unending hell for those who do not. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu loves God , he does NOT fear god of\nis nervous about his God\u2019s MERCY. &nbsp;Death\nfor the Hindu is merely transition, simultaneously an end and a new beginning.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iIX5YjtjzOE/V2plRFUvC1I/AAAAAAABKYU/VUU6eaH3gzQ0bQn6sZOtOE0OwEhefDChACLcB/s1600/imasrrges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"353\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iIX5YjtjzOE/V2plRFUvC1I/AAAAAAABKYU/VUU6eaH3gzQ0bQn6sZOtOE0OwEhefDChACLcB/s400/imasrrges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu knows from\nthe bottom of his heart that karma is always just and he ( soul ) is\nresponsible for his own karma.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He sees reincarnation as an explanation for many\nof the apparent inequalities observed in life.&nbsp;\nHe is NOT jealous of a rich and powerful man who has been dealt with all\nfour aces .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus understand the fairness even in a bad birth, say a birth as\na cripple or a child who dies in infancy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To the Hindu this is not an accident,\nbut is a natural event brought forth by the soul itself through the karma of\nunseemly acts and desires in a previous life<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ideas of sin and\nevil are different in Hinduism from the concepts held by Abrahamic\nreligions&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the Hindu does not\nlive in fear of sin or under the notion of original sin. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-viY_gHFIyM4/V2pyJjWGMhI/AAAAAAABKYw/WWIsdhfPQXUvPqrBqTUoFiQBgxQHtkGKACLcB/s1600/6ac8810ff1b65dd4cew9e24a2a0e82077a2589b60fc63498c2f96f0f3334ea3ea2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-viY_gHFIyM4/V2pyJjWGMhI/AAAAAAABKYw/WWIsdhfPQXUvPqrBqTUoFiQBgxQHtkGKACLcB/s400/6ac8810ff1b65dd4cew9e24a2a0e82077a2589b60fc63498c2f96f0f3334ea3ea2.jpg\" width=\"351\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Original sin, is Bible BULL\n&nbsp;-the doctrine of humanity's state of sin\nresulting from the fall of man, stemming from Adam and Eve's rebellion in Eden.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result of Original\nSin, human nature is weakened.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AIYOOO. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The consequences of this\nweakness and the inclination to evil persist, and we often commit personal or\nactual sin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DOUBLE &nbsp;&nbsp;AIYYOOO .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jesus Christ ( who was\ncreated at the First Council of Nicea in 325 AD by Roman Emperor Constantine\nthe great ) willingly sacrificed himself on the cross for the redemption of\nhuman sins on the behalf of all humanity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRIPLE &nbsp;&nbsp;AIYOOOO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, So So, -- salvation\nfrom sin in general and original sin in particular is made possible by the\nlife, death, and resurrection of Jesus, which in the context of salvation is\nreferred to as the \"atonement\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>HAJAAAAAR &nbsp;&nbsp;AIYOOO </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-o1AoKAgsFdg/V2pyel0NaeI/AAAAAAABKY8/YrPMb4IWl_ArEHYDNdpWwwVBPyYT-DcKgCLcB/s1600/bd0955a6f7863945bfa01bddceabd9763a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-o1AoKAgsFdg/V2pyel0NaeI/AAAAAAABKY8/YrPMb4IWl_ArEHYDNdpWwwVBPyYT-DcKgCLcB/s640/bd0955a6f7863945bfa01bddceabd9763a.jpg\" width=\"532\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>In Sanatana Dharma we\ndo not look upon humanity as inherently sinful, but inherently perfect and\nstriving to unfold that perfection from within .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Only you can give deliverence to yourself---&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>KHUDD TUM !.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oGkLmqLPzy0/V2px2u6nPaI/AAAAAAABKYo/dH-xLIatuQg6d6nF1hj85y6b00kcNw8CACLcB/s1600/imagdes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"258\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oGkLmqLPzy0/V2px2u6nPaI/AAAAAAABKYo/dH-xLIatuQg6d6nF1hj85y6b00kcNw8CACLcB/s400/imagdes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Hindu is patient and\ntolerant due to his firm belief in his faith.&nbsp;\nThe Hindu knows that we will have as many opportunities as needed to\nrefine and evolve --a thousand lives or more if needed. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We don't have to think that we only have a\nsingle chance, a one life in which everything must be accomplished and all\ndesires must be fulfilled.&nbsp; &nbsp;Therefore, we are not in a NO tearin\u2019 hurry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We exhibit more\npatience with circumstances than do those who believe in a one life, and we are\nmore forgiving of ourselves when we fall short. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism offers a great\njoy to its followers--a blessing of fearlessness in the face of death. He has a\ncalm inner assurance that soul ( HE ) will continue its journey after physical\ndeath.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He knows that his great grandfather , himself and his great grandson was born at the same split second along with the stars--when Brahma exhaled .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-riuQzcI-Ewo/V2pz4qLxwPI/AAAAAAABKZM/TOzy4N_plvAiJyh_kb_zvTLb2O1ESw3BACLcB/s1600/plaGnetarssyhierarchy.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-riuQzcI-Ewo/V2pz4qLxwPI/AAAAAAABKZM/TOzy4N_plvAiJyh_kb_zvTLb2O1ESw3BACLcB/s640/plaGnetarssyhierarchy.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iR0KLdyHzCw/V2p0HUm0mnI/AAAAAAABKZU/t12cWMMyPIMBP5dV_DIETxGyUkm-0q7MgCLcB/s1600/creation-dddd08.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"412\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iR0KLdyHzCw/V2p0HUm0mnI/AAAAAAABKZU/t12cWMMyPIMBP5dV_DIETxGyUkm-0q7MgCLcB/s640/creation-dddd08.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu knows that\nKarma is is own baby and karma is just and right, even when it seems that some\npeople are less fortunate than others and that fate has unfairly given all the\nadvantages to a few. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these things are\nbestowed on Hindus simply because they understand the doctrine of\nreincarnation.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism gives HOPE\n.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is a religion\nworth if it cant offer HOPE\u2014where it keeps calling you a shit bag of own sins ,\nwith an extra appendage of ORIGINAL sin \u2013 to be saved by a MERCIFUL god ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Several centuries ago,\nthe Pope decided that all the Jews had to leave the Vatican. Naturally there\nwas a big uproar from the Jewish community.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">So the Pope made a\ndeal. He would have a religious debate with a member of the Jewish community.\nIf the Jew won, the Jews could stay. If the Pope won, the Jews would leave.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Jews realized that\nthey had no choice. So they picked an elderly aged man named Moishe to\nrepresent them. Rabbi Moishe's Latin wasn't very good - in fact, he knew very\nlittle --- but he was a man of great faith and well respected in the Jewish\ncommunity.&nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The pope agreed. What could be easier than a silent debate?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;</span></i></span><i style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The day of the great\ndebate came. Moishe and the Pope sat opposite each other for a full minute\nbefore the Pope raised his hand and showed three fingers. Moishe looked back at\nhim and raised one finger. The Pope waved his fingers in a circle around his\nhead. Moishe pointed to the ground where he sat.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Pope pulled out a\nwafer and a glass of wine. Moishe pulled out an apple. The Pope stood up and\nsaid, \"I give up. This man is too good. The Jews can stay.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">An hour later, the\ncardinals were all around the Pope asking him what happened. The Pope said:\n\"First I held up three fingers to represent the Trinity. He responded by\nholding up one finger to remind me that there was still one God common to both\nour religions.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Then I waved my finger\naround me to show him that God was all around us. He responded by pointing to\nthe ground and showing that God was also right here with us.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 12pt;\">I pulled out the wine\nand the wafer to show that God absolves us from our sins. &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 12pt;\">He pulled out an\napple to remind me of &nbsp; ze&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>ORIGINAL SIN. </b></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He had an answer for\neverything. What could I do?\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Meanwhile, the Jewish\ncommunity had crowded around Moishe. \"What happened?\" they asked.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Well,\" said\nMoishe, \"First he said to me that the Jews had three days to get out of\nhere. I told him that not one of us was leaving.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Then he told me that\nthis whole city would be cleared of Jews. I let him know that we were staying\nright here.\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"And then?\"\nasked a woman.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"I don't\nknow,\" said Moishe. \"He took out his dang lunch and so I took out\nmine.\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1VTvx7NdrBQ/V2p2kBhVq4I/AAAAAAABKZk/wrJhfYwGHDEvtMDBuey5ZB5Alw4zD-JEgCLcB/s1600/adam-anddfd-eve.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1VTvx7NdrBQ/V2p2kBhVq4I/AAAAAAABKZk/wrJhfYwGHDEvtMDBuey5ZB5Alw4zD-JEgCLcB/s640/adam-anddfd-eve.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jpo6uU694sU/V2p3AtV4G3I/AAAAAAABKZs/KXSFsE3QM0gQPop4sVha2oeWJ6DyMmnaACLcB/s1600/addam%2Band%2Beve.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jpo6uU694sU/V2p3AtV4G3I/AAAAAAABKZs/KXSFsE3QM0gQPop4sVha2oeWJ6DyMmnaACLcB/s400/addam%2Band%2Beve.png\" width=\"327\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu finds &nbsp;great joy and hope in his relationship with\nGod .&nbsp;&nbsp; It is his relationship, and he\nalone is able to perpetuate it without the need of a priest.&nbsp; No one can do this work for him or on his\nbehalf.&nbsp; There is a great harmony between\nthe devotee and the deity within a temple .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hope for a future life\nmakes this life worthwhile, joyous, contented and happy, because the Hindu can\nlive and deal with current problems, knowing that they are transitory problems,\nthat they will not last forever; nor will they affect us forever. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are problems; we cannot\ndeny that. But they are problems to be worked out with a positive attitude and\na high energy and a helping hand from our Gods.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The COMMIE rationalists\nand the west who try t lead the Hindus from darkness to light, do NOT\nunderstand the Hindu psyche.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu does not have\nthe feeling of having to take a vacation every weekend to \"get away from\nit all.\" &nbsp;The western and wannabe\ngoragaand home is a unhappy one.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nHindu does NOT find the need to eat outside the home like the west.&nbsp; Marriages breakup in the west and children\nabuse their parents if the holidays and eatouts are NOT honored.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The west leads a worthless life of mental\nconfusions, religious contradictions and the frustrations that result from\nmodern hurried living. This is why there are divorces and mentally derailed\nwhite children rebel .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eevn the richest Hindu leads\na moderate life- a spiritual life.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oBxq4kVJovg/V2qEMJzwYWI/AAAAAAABKaY/8P0RHuUTDWs5WKiZ-ZEk0ZO4X_HAh-mzACLcB/s1600/kailash-pilgrffimage-tour.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oBxq4kVJovg/V2qEMJzwYWI/AAAAAAABKaY/8P0RHuUTDWs5WKiZ-ZEk0ZO4X_HAh-mzACLcB/s1600/kailash-pilgrffimage-tour.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;For a\nHindus the ultimate holiday is a pilgrimage. He does NOT seek comforts during\nthis pilgrimage\u2014he prefers to rough it out.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3cCfWVvkZds/V2qC-ydAt3I/AAAAAAABKaA/-EGuzKRW3c8rFZfVkFX2pQwgO4g8BaVKwCLcB/s1600/amarnath-yatra-dnewsx.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3cCfWVvkZds/V2qC-ydAt3I/AAAAAAABKaA/-EGuzKRW3c8rFZfVkFX2pQwgO4g8BaVKwCLcB/s1600/amarnath-yatra-dnewsx.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pilgrimage is as a\nspecial moment, a cherished time of setting ordinary concerns aside and giving\nfull stage to our spiritual longings. &nbsp;It\nis a time to take problems and prayers to our own personal Ishta devata ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Nk6Nr_Hqurk/V2qDqKwwjXI/AAAAAAABKaM/zaRkeOjFJPQZbbZuUQT6M1ZH6aSNMoEZgCLcB/s1600/gomukh-samdhu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Nk6Nr_Hqurk/V2qDqKwwjXI/AAAAAAABKaM/zaRkeOjFJPQZbbZuUQT6M1ZH6aSNMoEZgCLcB/s1600/gomukh-samdhu.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the narcissist rationalist\n\"free thinker \" who deem themselves emancipated, above the religious\nlife, we Hindus feel that receiving the darshana from the Gods and the spiritual\nsolace that comes therein invigorates our being and inspires us to be even more\ndiligent , to reduce our karmic load. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We Hindus do NOT care\nfor these pathetic rationalists who want to save us \u2013the Dabholkar, Pansare,\nKalburgi types \u2013 they can just screw themselves for all we care.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the commie rationalists\nwho feel cocksure that within themselves lie all the resources to meet all\nneeds, and that praying to Gods for help is a pathetic exercise in futility,\nthe Hindu wisely submits to the Divine and thus avoids the abyss of disbelief. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus are the happiest\npeople on this planet. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our benchmarks of\nhappiness do NOT include a posh car, page 3 parties, holidays on cruise ships,\ngold courses, yachts , wife swapping, bestiality or whatever.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pilgrimage is not\ntravel in the ordinary sense of travel, but rather going to see a dearest and\nmost respected personal friend, one who does not live in a physical body.&nbsp; He uses this period away from mundane chores\nto contemplate, self reflect and witness himself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pilgrimage is a sacred\njourney. It is a process that is not meant to simply get away from it all, but\nto allow oneself to encounter and experience the Divine.&nbsp; The Hindus undergoes voluntary austerities\nfor purification . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He seeks to relieve himself\nof his karmic baggage by charity and getting rid of soul samskaras. This\nprocess helps him to shed phobias and vices\u2014it hones his consciousness <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu knows that\nall souls will one day merge into brahmAn . He know how bramhmAn sheared off\nparts of its own field lowered its frequency and send them on earth as tiny\nballs of energy ( soul ) to give life on planet earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He know that brahmAn\nwho created all souls, slowly guides our maturing into His likeness, ( highest\nfrequency )&nbsp; brings us back to Himself,\nwhich is not separate from ourselves.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu, through\nstriving and personal development in this life on this planet, knows that\nliberation into God ( moksha \u2013 merging of soul back into brahman after every\nexperience on earth) is the final goal.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This knowing and this\nbelief release us from any EGO, from any superiority by which one person\nconsiders himself or herself as especially meriting God's grace while others\nare lost.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the Hindu, there is\nan assurance that all souls will eventually enjoy liberation, and that includes\nourselves and all of our friends and family. We need never fear otherwise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No other religion on\nthe Earth can ever begin to equal Hinduism's mystical teachings; all that\nwealth is the rightful inheritance of each Hindu. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yesterday we had Sadguru\nJaggi Vasudev , the darling of Freemasons and Benami Indian media, giving away\nYoga. This fellow does NOT represent Hinduism or India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma is\ntheocentric, that means God-centric, whereas most other religions are\nprophet-centric, revolving around the personality of some living person (\nmortal messiah ) or some person who once lived in history and interpreted\nreligion to his culture in his time. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma has no founder. &nbsp;It was never founded. It has neither a\nbeginning nor an end. It is coexistent with man himself. That is why it is\ncalled the Sanatana Dharma, the Eternal Path. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not one man's teaching or\ninterpretation. It is not limited to a single facet of religion, but consists\nof the entire spectrum, seen in its various components as if through a prism.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader hour\nafter hour struck at the roots of Hinduism\u2014the whole idea was to make the\nHindus self loathing \u2013 so that he will convert to Christianity with help from\nsops. &nbsp;By DIVIDE and RULE the white\ninvader \u2013 a few thousands of them , controlled and enslaved a land of millions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma has\nwithstood 800 years of slavery .&nbsp;\nInvaders have found out the hard way that Hinduism cannot be destroyed.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is false to think\nthat one has to be born a Hindu in order to be a Hindu. That is a concept\npostulated by certain caste-based Hindu lineages ( controlled from abroad ) and\nreinforced by the Christians in their effort to hinder the growth of our religion,\nto deprive it of new life, to hold it down while they in turn try to convert\nHindus en masse to their religion. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GHAR\nWAPSI is NOT required.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims and Christians\nof today were born into their religions because their ancestors fell to FEAR of\nsword or GREED of sops.&nbsp; People in Kerala\nmust be exempted as the Namboodiris and their offspring Nairs made life\nunbearable for lower varna Hindus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr. S. Radhakrishnan ,\nthe second president of India, wrote \"<i>In a sense, Hinduism may be regarded\nas the first example in the world of a missionary religion. Only its missionary\nspirit is different from that associated with the proselytizing creeds. It did\nnot regard as its mission to convert humanity to one opinion. For what counts\nis conduct and not belief. The ancient practice of vratyastoma, described fully\nin the Tandya Brahmana, shows that not only individuals but whole tribes were\nabsorbed into Hinduism.\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No Hindu, even if he\ndoes NOT pray can ever be too far away from sights, smells, sounds and symbols\nof his great religion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\u2019s\nfirst strategy of making Indians slaves was to convince Indians that Britain is\na HUGE nation while India is a small nation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/country-size-racist-conspiracy-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/country-size-racist-conspiracy-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The next step was to\nconvince Hindus that they had inherited a crude , savage and outdated religion\nand make him self loathing.&nbsp; They\nridiculing every aspect of the religion that could possibly be ridiculed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not any more !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today the Hindus is proud\nthat he is born in a holy land, adhering to the oldest and the best faith.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 7000 year old &nbsp;Rig Veda, states-</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Ekam sat vipraha bahudha vadanti,&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe Truth\nis one, the wise call It by many names.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We Hindus do NOT feel\nthe need to convert anybody\u2014it is NOT allowed. &nbsp;Anybody is free to walk IN or walk OUT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In consonance with its\npluralistic outlook, Hinduism has never sanctioned proselytization and asserts\nthat it is harmful to society\u2019s well being to insist one\u2019s own path to God is\nthe only true way. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus consider the\nwhole world as one extended family, and Hindu prayers often end with the\nrepetition of shanti \u2014 or peace for all of existence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">This 7000 year old\nverse from the Upanishads was part of our morning school prayer\u2014teachers and\nstudents both recite .</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vFoiMFTaFFU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/vFoiMFTaFFU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0950</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u0939</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u093e\u0935\u0935\u0924\u0941</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot;
