, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om Shaantih Shaantih\nShaantih ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1: OM, May God Protect\nus Both (the Teacher and the Student),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2: May God Nourish us\nBoth,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3: May we Work Together\nwith Energy and Vigour,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4: May our Study be\nEnlightening and not give rise to animosity,</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5: Om, Peace ( in me ),\nPeace ( environment ) , Peace ( cosmic forces ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the rest of the\nworld ate raw meat , lived in dark caves , wore animal skins , did grunt grunt\nfor language , and could not think beyond eating, going for a crap and\nsleeping-- Indians were talking about consciousness and quantum physics..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om Asato Maa Sad-Gamaya\n|<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tamaso Maa\nJyotir-Gamaya |<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mrtyor-Maa Amrtam\nGamaya |<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Om Shaantih Shaantih\nShaantih ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1: Lead us from Unreal\nto the Real,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2: Lead us from the\nDarkness to the Light,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3: Lead us from the\nFear of Death to the Knowledge of Immortality.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4: OM- Peace, Peace,\nPeace. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">(</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adidaivika,\nAdibhautika and Adhyatmika)</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Indians must know\nthat before the white invader came to India caste discrimination happened only\nin Kerala.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">6000 years ago, Saraswati river became non-perennial\ndue to its mouth at the Himalayan glacier getting blocked by a tectonic shift.\nThis is clearly described by Balarama , the brother of Krishna as he walks\nalong the drying river.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He arrived back\nafter his pilgrimage just in time to watch the final duel between Bhima and\nDuryodhana .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Mahabharata\nwar, 6000 years ago, Parashurama shifted the SRUTI texts penned down in 5000 BC\n, to Kerala , he came down to Kerala with the Namboodiri professors of\nSaraswati banks .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parashurama used AXE power , grabbed the fertile plain lands from\nThiyyas and donated it to Namboodiris . Till then NO brahmin in India could own\nland . . Whoever owns the land holds the power. The holders of Vedas held the power.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every ancient story in India\nstarted off with THERE WAS A POOR BRAHMIN .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wisdom ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was NO\nsubdivision and fragmentation of meager Kerala lands from 4000 BC till the\nwhite invader almost left India.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION of land is the\nbiggest problem in India today. A father who has 5 sons divided his 5 acres of\nland and now it becomes one acre. After land falls down to a small size\ncultivation becomes non-profitable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Namboodiris held\nTOTAL POWER from 4000 BC to 2000 BC\u2014as they held the Vedas and the fertile land.\n&nbsp;They became decadent, DEBAUCHED and\narrogant . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2000 BC, the last maharishi with 12 strand\nDNA Adi Shankaracharya ( a Namboodiri ) took away the 4 vedas and 108\nupanishads and distributed it into the 4 corners of India where he set up 4\noriginal mutts under a Namboodiri acharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was NO caste\nsystem in India till the white invader came to India. There were only 4 varnas\n. On the ship navigators cannot be engineers and vice versa\u2014as there are core\ncompetencies. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4 Vedas / 108 Upanishads\nwent on oral route for 30 millenniums till it was penned down in 5000 BC and\nthe human DNA degraded and it was NOT possible to commit humongous amount of Sanskrit\nverses into memory.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 5000 BC to 4000\nBC these SRUTI verses in writing remained at Saraswati river banks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE WERE ONLY 4\nORIGINAL MUTTS- BEFORE JEW ROTHSCHILD LEFT INDIA HE CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE\nMUTTS ALL OVER INDIA , EACH HEADED BY HIS OWN STOOGE.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Caste-based\ndiscrimination and \u201cuntouchability\u201d are purely social evils not accepted or\nrecognized anywhere in the Hindu scriptural tradition ( except in Kerala ) .\nThe word \u201ccaste\u201d is derived from the Portuguese \u201ccasta\u201d \u2014 meaning lineage,\nbreed, or race. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As such, there is no exact\nequivalent for \u201ccaste\u201d in Indian society, but what exists is the concept of\nvarna . &nbsp; The white invader divided by job description in Kerala\u2014in as much as a\ngold smith will NOT give his daughter to a iron smith in marriage even today<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sacred Sanskrit texts\ndescribe varna not as four rigid, societal classes, but as a metaphysical\nframework detailing four distinctive qualities which are manifest, in varying\ndegrees, in all individuals.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jati refers to the\noccupation-based, social units with which people actually identified\u2014like on a\nship we have engine crew, deck crew , catering crew.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Hindu scripture\nemphasizes equality of all mankind again and again.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No\none is superior, none inferior. All are brothers marching forward to\nprosperity.<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The greatness of\nHinduism cannot be compared with other religions. There is no basis for\ncomparison.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism, the Eternal way or Sanatana Dharma, has no beginning,\ntherefore will certainly have no end. It was never created, and therefore it\ncannot be destroyed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sruti ( Vedas /\nUpansihads ) were picked off the akasha as sound by Maharishis with 12 strand\nDNA during their meditative trances .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-13lj8Tchqpw/V2jIzlYiIUI/AAAAAAABKXM/K1CRetOjPfoKfB7ADsegYd965wBBYx-UQCLcB/s1600/imagccres.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-13lj8Tchqpw/V2jIzlYiIUI/AAAAAAABKXM/K1CRetOjPfoKfB7ADsegYd965wBBYx-UQCLcB/s320/imagccres.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma is a God-centric\nreligion. The center of it is God.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader tried to inject a atheist\nCharvaka branch\u2014it wont work .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All of\nthe other religions are prophet-centric. The center of those religions is a\ngreat saint or sage, a prophet, a messenger or messiah, some God-Realized\nperson who has lived on Earth and died.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NlgZJQiEPyo/V2jBYzy9KQI/AAAAAAABKWQ/f5VtEGv7Xto3-QxHwX3e0FPazfYbrSihACLcB/s1600/workplace-spiritualitymddeeba-nit-kurukshetra-2-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NlgZJQiEPyo/V2jBYzy9KQI/AAAAAAABKWQ/f5VtEGv7Xto3-QxHwX3e0FPazfYbrSihACLcB/s640/workplace-spiritualitymddeeba-nit-kurukshetra-2-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_200TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.4px; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_258B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c757614502844652677\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_258M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil &nbsp; &nbsp;January 16, 2014 at 12:50 AM<br />\nhi t,<br />\n<br />\nDON\u2019T EVER BOTHER TO SEEK AN ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTION ( RELIGION VS SPIRITUALITY ) ON THE INTERNET \u2014<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NOBODY WHO HAS THE WISDOM TO ANSWER YOUR PROFOUND QUESTION .<br />\n<br />\nHinduism was developed along spiritual lines, NOT religious lines\u2014the reason why 800 years of slavery could NOT stamp out this amazing way of life..<br />\n<br />\nHindusim is NOT a religion, it is the practise of spirituality by elevating human consciousness in the personal quest for truth.<br />\n<br />\nIndia and Bali are the last pockets of spirituality on this planet. Why do you think the spirituality seeking white man goes to these places in droves?<br />\n<br />\nThese foreigners can comprehend that Hinduism is based on reason and NOT faith -- unless the faith is an extension of reason.<br />\n<br />\nHindusim is a relentless pursuit of truth, flexible to suit all situations.<br />\n<br />\nAt the heart of Hinduism remains mans' essential quest for union with the Absolute supreme the brahmAn. In addition to tradition and moral order, it also signifies the path of knowledge and correct action ( Dharma ).<br />\n<br />\nIslam and Christianity are religions. These religions had Inquisitions.<br />\n<br />\nJews were too busy following their VULGAR and racist Talmud.<br />\n<br />\nAhimsa ( non-violence ) even vegetarianism , is a characteristic of Hinduism\u2014due to which vile foreign invaders took advantage..<br />\n<br />\nWhat the waitress calls SAFFRON TERROR -- is just the hindus making a free choice NOT to be cowards anymore and giving back as good as they got.<br />\n<br />\nToday when a patient and tolerant Hindu gets outraged and decides to retaliate, rivers of blood flows on the streets .<br />\n<br />\nHinduism can never dream of all this for openness and inclusivity is the essence of Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism is a spiritual code. Know thyself is the quintessence.<br />\n<br />\nHinduism has a total lack of compulsions. You cannot get ex-communicated for NOT toeing the line.<br />\n<br />\nThe diversity, the range, and the lofty metaphysical aspirations of Vedanta are mindboggling.<br />\n<br />\nLoaded truth is delivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a single agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity, and Muhammad in Islam.<br />\n<br />\nThese truths are then recorded in scriptures that serve as a source of knowledge of divine wisdom: the Hebrew Bible, the New Testament of the Christian Bible, and the Koran. In the Hindu tradition, by utter contrast, there is no single revelation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu spirituality tradition , unlike other religions -- has always concerned itself with the \u201chuman\u201d situation rather than the \u201cour religion \u201c situation.<br />\n<br />\nUnder the doctrine of karma, the ability to make choices remains with the individual-and NOT what is being told as gospel in a holy book .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Ask the Jews\u2014they will say India is the only place where they never got persecuted over thousands of years\u2014they always ran here for refuge- &nbsp;yet gratitude is missing .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nThe reason ?<br />\n<br />\nThis country had denizens steeped in spirituality \u2014 NOT religious bigots. Hebrew religion and Hinduism co-existed.<br />\n<br />\nYet today foreign funded Indian TV calls all Hindus bigots \u2013what a joke !.<br />\n<br />\nI AM LUCKY TO BE BORN IN INDIA\u2014 HAVING SEEN WHAT THE REST OF THIS PLANET HAS TO OFFER FOR 40 YEARS .!<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5154760618160982882\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_19M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/15821032784898340982\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Ishan Sharma</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1466484628589#c5154760618160982882\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 21, 2016 at 10:20 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_19MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRespected Captain Vadakayil<br />\nhttp://www.speakingtree.in/blog/meaning-of-sai-mantra<br />\nThese bunch of jokers have even concocted Vedic mantras for Sai Baba, a man who died only 100 years ago. Women used to be afraid of him, as he used to wear torn clothes, smoke hashish and mutter under his breath, when he saw them approaching. He often used to take his intestines out of his anus to dry it-- yogis usually wash it in the river..<br />\n<br />\nSince he often uttered \"allah malik\" ( allah is supreme ) and did namaz daily, and was dressed like a sufi singer, he was directed to stay in a dilapidated mosque where he stayed for the next 50 years.<br />\n<br />\nIn the disused broken down mosque he maintained a fire for warming himself which he referred to as a dhuni, from which he gave sacred ashes ('Udhi') to his guests before they left \u2013 always with the words ALLAH MALIK ( allah is supreme ) . He was illiterate and did NOT know how to read or write.<br />\n<br />\nA Haji Abdul Baba appeared from nowhere and gave company to Sai Baba when he became too old.<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild converted him to an avatar of Hindu god Shiva after he died . Sorry, Lord Shiva has NO avatars. Till he died he was a local man and the local muslims created a dargah. Today NO muslim goes there .<br />\n<br />\nAs soon as he died the white invader created a Hindu temple at Bhivpuri, Karjat , Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nA myth was perpetrated that \" He who cometh to My Mazaar(tomb), his sorrow and suffering shall cease\".<br />\n<br />\nShirdi was a small farming village consisting of a few dilapidated houses in 1918 , when shirdi sai baba died.<br />\n<br />\nToday the town survives on a \"money spinning \" industry.... Shirdi Sai baba industry. It is estimated they milk more than hundreds of crores every year.<br />\n<br />\nThey splashed in Parsi/ Chitpavan Brahmin controlled media about miracles such as invisibilty, astral travel, bilocation, levitation, mindreading, materialisation, exorcisms, making the river Yamuna, entering a state of Samadhi at will ( this takes the cake ) , lighting lamps with water, removing his limbs or intestines and sticking them back to his body (khandana yoga if you pleaJJe ), curing the incurably sick, appearing beaten when another was beaten, after death rising on third day ( resurrection like Jesus Christ ), preventing a mosque from falling down on people, and helping his devotees in miraculous ways, creating ad stopping rain BLAH BLAH .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_16MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_16BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_16B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_17B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4661614661948131711\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_17M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The words MAM EVA are\nsignificant. M\u0101m means Vishnu alone, and not Brahma or Shiva. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although creator Brahma and destroyer Shiva are at the same level of mediator Vi\u1e63h\u1e47u, it is not\npossible for such incarnations of rajo-gu\u1e47a (passion) and tamo-gu\u1e47a (ignorance)\nto release the conditioned soul from the clutches of maya.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma and Shiva controls the actions as CREATOR- DESTROYER <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vi\u1e63h\u1e47u as the\nPRESERVER/ MEDIATOR / SUSTAINER is the master of maya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva says:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">mukti-prad\u0101t\u0101 sarve\u1e63\u0101\u1e41\nvi\u1e63\u1e47ur eva na sa\u1e41\u015baya\u1e25.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"There is no doubt\nthat Vi\u1e63h\u1e47u is the deliverer of liberation for everyone\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SEVENTH ASTRAL\nLAYER IS VAIKUNTA \u2013 ABODE OF VISHNU .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theory of Maya is\none of the grand pillars&nbsp; upon which\nVedanta rests.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word origin of MAYA\nis derived from the Sanskrit roots MA ( not ) and&nbsp; YA ( that ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Know nature to be\nMaya and the Ruler of this Maya is the Lord Himself.</span>\" -- Svetasvatara\nUpanishad 5000 BC .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tamas \u2013 Rajas ( Shiva \u2013\nBrahma ) &nbsp;, which are rooted together ,\nis present in every phenomenon on earth., where energy transforms from one to\nanother\u2014it can neither be created or destroyed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These two opposing\nforces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony.&nbsp; Harmony can never be stagnant .&nbsp; Lessening of Tamas always results in increase\nof Rajas and vice versa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One cannot exist\nwithout the other and they are dependant .&nbsp;\nNo phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its\nopposite.&nbsp; They consume each other yet\nsupport each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever is in excess\ngets reduces, whatever is deficient gets replenished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Balance can never be\npermanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must ponder over\neach waxing-waning cycle to appreciate the absolute truth . They keep each\nother in check, yet provide fuel to feed off each other. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tamas creates Rajas,\nand Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Tamas influences Rajas not only from inside\nbut also from outside.. they are rooted together.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Few examples of this\neternal cycle of inter dependant reversal and immediate exchange are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Gravity / Antigravity</span></i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"background-color: lime; color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The phenomenal world\noperates under maya, the law of duality or oppositional states</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><b>-</b>&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Srimad </b></span><b style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">Bhagavatam, verse 3.26.4:[1] 5000 BC</span><o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">sa e\u1e63a prak\u1e5bti\u1e3f s\u016bk\u1e63m\u0101\u1e3f<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">daiv\u012b\u1e3f gu\u1e47amay\u012b\u1e3f vibhu\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">yad\u1e5bcchayaivopagat\u0101m<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">abhyapadyata l\u012blay\u0101</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"As His pastimes,\nthat Supreme Personality of Godhead, the greatest of the great, accepted the\nsubtle material energy, which is invested with three material modes of\nnature.\"</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term MAYA&nbsp; is mentioned&nbsp;\n72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC.&nbsp; Maya is mentioned&nbsp; 29 times in the Atharva Veda.&nbsp;&nbsp; In Puranas and Vaishnava theology,&nbsp; Maya is described as one of the nine shaktis\nof the reclining Vishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAYA is the veritable\nfabric of duality, and she performs this role at the behest of BrahmAn, the\nmorphogenetic consciousness field..&nbsp;&nbsp; The\nSupreme God is not bound by Maya&nbsp; just as\nmagicians do not believe the illusions of their own magic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our 5 senses serve as a\nfilter allowing us to experience only what is absolutely necessary for our\nphysical existence.&nbsp; The 5 senses create\nthe set for the stage we call our lives.&nbsp;\nThe senses squelch out , let we will have a breakdown due to excess\ninformation.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya is invisible\nand&nbsp; beyond sense-perception. No human\ncan see beyond the quantum screen .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dvaita Hinduism tells\nus about the duality of nature and existence .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These dual poles of Tamas \u2013Rajas are connected via consciousness.&nbsp; It is about the quantum possibility wave\nvibration between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This guarantees change,\ngrowth and evolution Lessening of Rajas always results in increase of Tamas and\nvice versa.&nbsp; One cannot exist without the\nother and they are mutually dependant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leela or divine play ,\nis a way of describing all reality, including the cosmos, as the outcome of\ncreative play by BrahmAn, the intelligent empty space in which the electrons in\nan atom whiz around.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya may be understood\nas the phenomenal universe of perceived duality ( Dvaita Vedanta ) , a lesser\nreality-lens superimposed on the unity of BrahmAn ( Advaita Vedanta )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the Gita says\n\"The Universe produced phenomenally in me, is pervaded by me. . . From me\nthe world is born, in me it exists, in me it dissolves.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It can only be understood if we understand\nconsciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why the &nbsp;shallow\nwestern mind who could NOT figure out consciousness &nbsp;, thought that the glorious Vedas are bumpkin\nshepherds verses .&nbsp; Only consciousness\ncan explain consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedas are NOT about\nIndra running around like a jack ass looking for lost cows and then doing a blood\nsacrifice so that he can get the strength to screw the asuras...</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u015ba\u015bvat pra\u015b\u0101ntam abhaya\u1e41\npratibodha-m\u0101tra\u1e41<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u015buddha\u1e41 sama\u1e41 sad-asata\u1e25\nparam\u0101tma-tattvam<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u015babdo na yatra\npuru-k\u0101rakav\u0101n kriy\u0101rtho<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">m\u0101y\u0101 paraity abhimukhe\nca vilajjam\u0101n\u0101<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">tad vai pada\u1e41 bhagavata\u1e25\nparamasya pu\u1e41so<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">brahmeti yad vidur\najasra-sukha\u1e41 vi\u015bokam--&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Srimad-Bhagavatam\n(2.7.47): 5000 BC</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"What is realized\nas the Absolute Brahman is full of unlimited bliss without grief. That is\ncertainly the ultimate phase of the supreme enjoyer, the Personality of\nGodhead. He is eternally devoid of all disturbances, fearless, completely\nconscious as opposed to matter, uncontaminated and without distinctions. He is\nthe principal, primeval cause of all causes and effects, in whom there is no\nsacrifice for fruitive activities and in whom the illusory energy does not\nstand.\"</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This verse was spoken\nby Lord Brahma when he was questioned by the great sage Narada.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Narada was surprised to see the creator of the\nuniverse meditating, for this indicated there might be someone greater than\nLord Brahma. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While answering the\ngreat sage Narada, Lord Brahma described the position of MAYA and the\nbewildered living entities.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BrahmAn alone is\nperfect.&nbsp;&nbsp; Everything in creation, being\ndelimited, is imperfect.&nbsp;&nbsp; The very\nbeginning of creation gave rise to the law of duality&nbsp; . Dvaita Vedanta gives us a peek beyond the\nveil of maya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Advaita Vedanta, the\nonly reality is BrahmAn, the Oneness. All else that exists is surface reality\nof the world around us. Beyond this surface reality lies the true Absolute\nReality, and that is BrahmAn. BrahmAn is the only reality of this world and all\nothers have only relative reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Concerning matter,\nEinstein once remarked ( lifted from Vedanta ) , &nbsp;\"we have been all wrong. What we have\ncalled matter is energy, whose vibration has been so lowered as to be\nperceptible to the senses. There is no matter.\"&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Vedanta clearly states that the illusion\noften mistaken for reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaita is that state\nof non-duality where there is complete cessation of thoughts such as \"I am\nan individual\", \"the objects that are seen / perceived are different\nfrom me\", so on and so forth. In this state, there is no misery or\ndelusion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Tatra ko moha:\nka: shoka:\"-- \"Where is delusion or misery for the one who has\nrealized this non-dual state?\"--- Ishavasya Upanishad- 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6146706244452495786\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_9M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_23.html?showComment=1466690264070#c6146706244452495786\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 23, 2016 at 7:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_9MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nQwerty<br />\nJune 23, 2016 at 5:53 PM<br />\n<br />\nCapt., As you said, We worship Vishnu because he mediates the creator and destroyer forces and is the master of maya. But why Shiva ji and why not Brahma ji?<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n####################<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJune 23, 2016 at 7:22 PM<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SHIVA</span></b> IS COMING IN THE THIRD TEMPLATE OF SANKHYA -- PURUSHA / PRAGATI-- IS ACCEPTED AS SHIVA/ SHAKTI( PARVATI )<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BRAHMA</span></b> IS COMING IN THE FIRST TEMPLATE --AS THE COSMIC FORCE WHICH EXHALED THE COSMOS INTO BEING.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE SECOND TEMPLATE OF DVAITA --<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">VISHNU</span></b> CONTROLS MAYA.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When creation occurs,\nthe universe the essence of which was always within Brahman evolves itself and\nissues out of the Brahman with name and form, this is what is called creation.\nBrahman creates the world just as a spider creates it's webs out of itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas contain the\nmeaning of consciousness. A visible attribute of consciousness is an energetic\nfield that governs the shaping of organisms. Morphogenesis is a scientific term\nto explain this very shaping of tissues, organs, and entire organisms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4000 years ago Adi Sankaracharya\ndescribes the nature of Brahman as such: \u201cThat which permeates all, which\nnothing transcends and which, like the universal space around us, fills\neverything completely from within and without, that Supreme nondual Brahman -\nthat thou art.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Vedas tell\nus that the basis of all creation is the all pervading&nbsp; morphogenetic consciousness field. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fields of conscousness\nare called M fields \u2013morphogenetic.&nbsp; Just\nlike electromagnetic and gravitational fields.&nbsp;\nAll life forms are connected by \"morphic fields\" or strong\nintertwined energetic connections. Our separation from each other is an optical\nillusion of consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Without and\nwithin all beings the unmoving and also the moving; because of Its subtlety,\nunknowable; and near and far away is That( brahmAn )\". --- Bhagavad Gita,\nCh.13,Verses 15- 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is the\ncreative force of the entire universe. The entire universe is in fact a single\nliving conscious organism with complete awareness of itself.&nbsp; Not only is consciousness responsible for the\nphysical universe and its elements-- it is the universe.&nbsp; The field of consciousness contains\ninformation about everything that has happened since the dawn of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Om purnamadah purnamidam\npurnaat purnamudachyate,purnasya purnamadaya purnamevaavashishyate\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"That&nbsp; (consciousness) is full (perfect) ; this (the\nmanifest universe of matter; of names and forms being maya) is full. This\nfullness has been projected from that fullness. When this fullness merges in\nthat fullness,&nbsp; all that remains is\nfullness.\"--- Isa Upanishad- 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fabric of the\nuniverse, the primal Field, was created by consciousness and is held in\nexistence by consciousness. The entire universe is the consciousness of the\nCreator. Consciousness creates energy, it creates matter, and it creates the perspectives\nof space and time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaita is a system that\nstates that all is the Self.&nbsp; That which\nis me, that which is you. That which is the world, that which is in the world,\nthat which is transcendent of the world\u2013all is the Self. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahman is at best\ndescribed as that infinite, omnipresent, omnipotent, incorporeal, impersonal,\ntranscendent reality that is the divine ground of all Being. Brahman is also\nbeyond the senses. It is the basis of the material world, which in turn is its\nillusionary transformation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Adi\nShankaracharya, Maya is the complex illusionary power of Brahman which causes\nthe Brahman to be seen as the material world of separate forms.&nbsp; It has two main functions \u2014 one is to\n\"hide\" Brahman from ordinary human perception, and the other is to\npresent the material world in its stead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya is also said to be\nindescribable, though it may be said that all sense data entering ones\nawareness via the five senses are Maya, since the fundamental reality\nunderlying sensory perception is completely hidden. Maya is neither completely\nreal nor completely unreal and hence indescribable. Its shelter is Brahman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahman is actually\nindescribable but Brahman itself is untouched by the illusion of Maya, just\nlike a magician is not tricked by his own magic. . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Maya is removed,\nthere exists ultimately no difference between the Jiva-Atman and the Brahman. &nbsp;Such a state of bliss when achieved while\nliving is called Jivan mukti\u2014he liberated soul.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freedom from having to\ngo through the experiencing of \u2018sorrow or happiness\u2019 is to be free of\n\u2018bondage.\u2019 That is liberation right in this life or Jivanmukti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jivanmukti is the name\nfor staying unperturbed, whatever may be the circumstances (= results of\nactions done now or in the past), like an unflickering and steady flame from a\nlamp which is in a place where there is no breeze.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First of all,\nunderstanding Advaita requires you to let go of all that you know or believe to\nbe true...Just let go and make your mind blank. Awareness of our true nature\nmelts away each layer of Maya. Advaita Vedanta can be the spiritual path for\nboth the scientist and the spiritual person, so that the two need not be\nmutually exclusive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The central position of\nthe Advaita Vedanta tradition is that in reality there is no difference between\nconsciousness and the universe, no real distinction between the individual, the\nentire universe and God, Brahman.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaita (\nnon-dual),&nbsp; declares that the universe is\na manifestation of one nondifferentiated reality, expressed in Sanskrit as\nBrahman,&nbsp; neuter in gender it literally\nmeans \u201cgrowth\u201d, \"development\"or the \u201cSupreme transcendent and\nimmanent Reality or the One Godhead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karmajam budhiyuktha hi\nbhalam thyakthwa maneeshina:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">janmabandhanavinirmuktha:\npadam gachandhyanamayam&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those intelligent\npeople, who think about the truth, who perform their duty or endeavor with\nskill, and with the evenness of mind with regard to success or failure (yogis),\nbecome totally freed from the restraints or shackles from birth onwards, and\nsurely reaches the state of no sorrow.-- [Bhagavad Gita, Chapter 2, verse 51]\n4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people seek\nexternal happiness from external objects, while the truth is that eternal bliss\nis within oneself and the search must be made within to attain this supreme\nbliss.&nbsp; All the pleasures that are\nderived from the external objects are trifles compared to that eternal bliss\nwhich is the Supreme.&nbsp; The concept of\nAdvaita philosophy is to helps to attain liberation, the nature of which is\neternal bliss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suffering is due to\nMaya. Only knowledge of Brahman can destroy Maya.&nbsp;&nbsp; Maya tricks us with regard to our\nselves&nbsp; When Maya is removed, the truth\nof \"Brahma Satyam Jagan Mithya Jivo Brahmaiva Na Aparah\" is realized\nBrahman (the Absolute) is alone real; this world is unreal; the Jiva or the\nindividual soul is non-different from Brahman Such a state of bliss when\nachieved while living is called Jivanmukta-the liberated soul..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All sense data entering\nones awareness via the five senses are Maya.&nbsp;\nMaya is neither completely real nor completely unreal, hence\nindescribable.&nbsp; Maya is temporary and is\ntranscended with \"true knowledge\", or perception of the more\nfundamental reality which permeates Maya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya has two main\nfunctions:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To \"hide\"\nBrahman from ordinary human perception,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To present the material\nworld in its (Brahmam) place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya of the Vedanta, in\nits last developed form, is neither Idealism nor Realism, nor is it a theory.\nIt is a simple statement of facts\u2014what we are and what we see around us<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world is both\nunreal and real. but something can't be both true and false at the same time;\nhence Adi Shankara has classified the world as indescribable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Sankara says that\nthe world is not real (true), it is an illusion. Adi Sankara gives the\nfollowing reasoning: <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u201cWhatever thing remains\neternal is true, and whatever is non-eternal is untrue. Since the world is\ncreated and destroyed, it is not real (true). Truth is the thing which is\nunchanging. Since the world is changing, it is not real (false). Whatever is\nindependent of space and time is real (true), and whatever has space and time\nin itself is not real (false). Just as one sees dreams in sleep, he sees a kind\nof super-dream when he is waking. The world is compared to this conscious dream\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">na jayathe mriyathe va\nkathachith nayam bhuthua bhavitha va na bhuya:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ajo nithya:\nshashwathohayam purano na hanyathe hanyamane shareere&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Supreme Soul or\nParamathma or Iswara was never ever born, nor does It die. And since It is now,\nit does not mean that It will not be. That Soul is unborn, is always, forever,\nand ancient also. As the (human) body is killed, It is not killed. Bhagawat\nGita&nbsp; [Chapter 2, verse 20] 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhagavad Gita... the\nmost sacred Scripture of Hinduism existing on Mother Earth ( a 6000 year old\npep talk given by Lord Krishna to Prince Arjuna just before a battle ) is\nwithout a parallel... it's sublime wisdom shall never get outdated with passage\nof time!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As it is\nanywhere, so it is everywhere.\"&nbsp; You\nare the embodiment of all the Laws of Nature. You are the constitution of the\nUniverse.--7000 year old Rig Veda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphogenetic fields\nhelp to differentiate cells and form biological systems. They&nbsp; instruct genes to produce necessary proteins\nin a given biological environment. Morphogenetic fields are not material, but\nare more like biological blueprints giving birth to various forms. They carry\nencoded organizational information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas said that\nthis universe and everything in it are a singularity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Yatha pinde tatha\nbrahmande, yatha brahmande tatha pinde\"--\"As is the individual, so is\nthe universe, as is the universe, so is the individual.\"&nbsp; --Yajur Veda 5000 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our consciousness is a\ncosmic DVD player . There is a cosmic dance of energy back and forth between\nthe physical realm and the zero point field,&nbsp;\na constant creation and destruction of matter from the void.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness becomes\nenergy and then transforms to matter.&nbsp;\nForces of attraction cause the particles to come together to form nuclei\nwith electrons orbiting around them giving the illusion of matter.&nbsp; These atoms are attracted together to form\nmolecules. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Molecules are brought\ntogether by organizing forces inherent in the particular morphogenetic field of\nthat being or material, causing the creation of DNA, cells, tissue, organs,\nsystems, organisms, societies and on a larger scale, planets, solar systems,\ngalaxies and universes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All of this from the\none and only quantum field of consciousness Our consciousness creates our\nreality.
